short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make Phrazle more accessible for colorblind users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Accessible Phrazle" is a chrome extension that improves the accessibility of the online game "Phrazle" for colourblind users. It does this by updating the colours used in the game and adding different icons to make the game more accessible for players with colourblindness.
